about_the_game:
Plot:
Once a proud Victorian mansion, Thrushbriar Hall became a boarding school that quickly developed a bad reputation. Mired in controversy, the school shut down long ago. Today it is rumored to be haunted. Cheryl, your ghost hunting partner, is sure this is the investigation that will make a name for yourselves.

Cheryl arrived a few days ago. However, her last voice mail makes it sound as if something is very wrong.

Display Modes:
Playable in non-VR and VR

Game Type:
Survival Horror
Puzzle

Features:
Explore the mansion known as Thrushbriar Hall and find items to help solve puzzles.
Avoid ghosts that lurk within the house by hiding in various locations.
Utilize your spectral camera that will allow you to see Ghosts and Hidden Messages throughout the house.
Discover the mystery of what happened to Cheryl and the dark secrets that Thrushbriar Hall holds.
detailed_description:
Thank you for the support

It is with deep regret that Poison Nut Games will be shutting down for a while. We will be closing our Steam store page and will be offering Thrustbriar Hall for free on Itch.io Thank you for all of the support.

short_description: A Victorian mansion with a dark secret, gathering more information will help you solve the mystery around the activity haunting this place. The mansion’s residents have captured you within its walls and it is up to you to figure out how to get out.
